Maria Lopez.description: Maria Lopez and Klaus Mueller plan to collaborate on a physics and technology project while also considering streaming indie games with social justice themes on Twitch. In a new conversation, Maria suggests attending a social justice seminar to further explore the impact of technology on social justice issues, and Klaus agrees to join and share their perspectives <fill in>. @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Hey Klaus, have you thought more about attending the social justice seminar with me? I think it could be a great opportunity for us to explore new ideas.
Hey Maria, I've been thinking about it, and I agree. It's important to delve into the intersection of technology and social justice. Let's definitely go together.
